rooms.description: A spacious entryway that doubles as a mudroom, designed with Scandinavian minimalism and functional storage.
An open-plan living area combining the living room, dining space, and kitchen. Large windows ensure natural light, adhering to Vastu principles for energy flow.
A compact yet efficient Scandinavian-style kitchen with essential modern fixtures and storage, integrated with the dining area.
A master bedroom designed for comfort and privacy, featuring built-in wardrobes and a small study corner as per Vastu recommendations.
Functional en-suite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom ensuring privacy.
Small space for laundry and storage, maximizing functionality on a tight budget.

openings.description: Large front door designed to welcome natural energy, following Vastu guidelines.
Expansive window offering abundant daylight and enhancing the connection with the garden.
Balcony door opening to a small terrace space that overlooks the garden.

garden.description: A landscaped garden area utilizing native plants and Scandinavian design elements for sustainability, promoting relaxation and well-being.

additional_features.description: High-performance insulation materials chosen to meet budget constraints while ensuring energy efficiency.
Smart lighting design using LED fixtures that enhance the Scandinavian aesthetic and reduce energy consumption.
Multi-functional storage integrated into walls and furniture, maximizing space on a tight budget.
